data.actual_result: After a few cycles of repeating steps 2-3, Discord will either softlock or softcrash, forcing you to CTRL + R.
data.expected_result: You should be able to navigate in and out of both screens with no issue.
data.short_description: Entering channel settings and exiting out in rapid succession causes Discord to either softlock or softcrash.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server that allows you to edit channel settings.  - Enter the settings of any channel. - As you enter into settings, rapidly press 'esc'.  - As you exit out of settings, rapidly repeat steps 2-3.
